Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Cuba
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Cuba 
    Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" was published in pamphlet by the Gecit Publishing House of Cuba on Feb.12.
 This work, published on November 1, Juche 83 (1994),clarifies that Korean-style socialism based on the socialist theory of Juche is most scientific and viable  socialism and clearly explains principled matters arising in defending socialism.

articles.title: Japan's Revision of "Law on Foreign Exchange" Rebuffed
articles.content:
Japan's Revision of "Law on Foreign Exchange" Rebuffed
    Tokyo, February 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- Un Jong In, secretary general of the Association of Young Korean Workers in Commerce in Japan in a statement dismissed the "amendment to the law on foreign exchange" railroaded through the Japanese Diet as an unpardonable challenge to the DPRK and an infringement upon the human rights of the Koreans in Japan.
 Japan's revised "law on foreign exchange" is an inhuman act of preventing the Koreans in Japan from getting in touch with their relatives in the homeland and threatening the lives of the compatriots engaged in trade with the DPRK, he said.    
 He strongly demanded Japan improve its relations with the DPRK through dialogue, not through pressure and sanctions and the Japanese government implement the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration at an early date to establish the friendly relations with the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Buildup in S. Korea Condemned
KCNA Blasts U.S. Smear Campaign against DPRK
Moves for Additional Troop Dispatch to Iraq under Fire
Russian Embassy Officials Visit National Fine Art Exhibition
articles.content:
Russian Embassy Officials Visit National Fine Art Exhibition
    Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Andrei Karlov and staff members of the Russian embassy here visited the national fine art exhibition celebrating February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il, on February 20.
 They looked round with deep emotion the paintings showing the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed in glorifying the dignity and honor of Kim Il Sung's Korea and implementing the human cause of independence with his extraordinary political ability and the features of the army and people of Korea demonstrating heroic feats in the struggle to build a great prosperous powerful nation under the Songun policy of the Workers' Party of Korea.    
 The ambassador wrote in the visitor's book that through the visit he deeply felt once again the deep respect of the Korean people for Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Japan's Base Anti-DPRK Campaign Assailed

Foreigners Visit DPRK Embassies
European Parliamentary Assembly Delegation Here
articles.content:
European Parliamentary Assembly Delegation Here
    Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of members of the European Parliamentary Assembly from political parties led by Jacques Santer, who is former president of the European Commission, arrived here today.
 It was welcomed at the airport by Ji Jae Ryong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and British Ambassador to the DPRK David Arthur Slinn.

articles.title: DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Libya
articles.content:
DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Libya
    Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A government economic delegation of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea led by Kim Kwang Rin, chairman of the State Planning Commission, left here today to participate in the 15th meeting of the DPRK-Libya Joint Committee.
 It was seen off at the airport by Jo Yong Nam, vice-chairman of the State Planning Commission, Ri Ryong Nam, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, and officials concerned.
